chat.welcome_authenticated: Hello! I'm here to help you with your CV creation and editing. How can I assist you today?
chat.welcome_guest: Welcome! I can help you with CV creation and editing. Sign in to save your progress and access advanced features, or feel free to ask questions to get started!
chat.auth_success: Great! You're now signed in. I can now help you with advanced CV features like file editing and collaboration. What would you like to work on?
chat.chat_cleared_authenticated: Chat history has been cleared. How can I help you with your CV?
chat.chat_cleared_guest: Chat history has been cleared. I can help you with CV questions, or sign in for the full experience!
chat.input_placeholder_authenticated: Ask me anything about CV creation...
chat.input_placeholder_guest: Ask me about CV tips... (Sign in for advanced features)
chat.help_text_authenticated: Press Enter to send • This is a demo chat with fake responses
chat.help_text_guest: Press Enter to send • Sign in to unlock unlimited conversations and CV editing
chat.header_subtitle_guest: Sign in for full features • Guest mode available
chat.auth_prompt_subtitle: Get the most out of your CV assistant
chat.auth_prompt_description: Sign in to unlock advanced features like file editing, collaboration tools, and unlimited conversations.
chat.limit_dialog_description: You've reached the message limit. Would you like to clear the chat history to continue?

fileEditor.signInToEdit: Sign in to view and edit your files
fileEditor.signInGoogle: Sign in with Google to access your CV files and start editing
fileEditor.autoSaveOn: ON - Files automatically save 10 seconds after editing
fileEditor.autoSaveOff: OFF - Files must be saved manually with Ctrl+S or Save button
fileEditor.signInToEnableAutoSave: Sign in to enable auto-save feature
fileEditor.signInToViewFiles: Sign in to view your CV files
fileEditor.signInToSave: Please sign in to save files
fileEditor.sessionExpired: Session expired. Please sign in again
fileEditor.confirmCloseUnsaved: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to close this file?
fileEditor.signInToCreateCollaborators: Please sign in to create collaborators
fileEditor.signInToUploadPictures: Please sign in to upload pictures
fileEditor.signInToGenerateCV: Please sign in to generate CVs
fileEditor.signInToAccessFiles: Please sign in to access files
fileEditor.authRequiredToView: Authentication required to view file content
fileEditor.sessionExpiredMessage: Session expired. Please sign in again.
fileEditor.collaboratorFolderTooltip: Collaborator folder: {name} - Click to expand/collapse and select for actions
fileEditor.editableFileTooltip: Editable file: {name} - Click to open in editor ({language})
fileEditor.readonlyFileTooltip: Read-only file: {name} - File type not supported for editing
fileEditor.uploadPictureTooltip: Upload profile picture for {name} (JPG, PNG supported)
fileEditor.generateCVTooltip: Generate and download CV PDF for {name}
fileEditor.closeFileTooltip: Close file (will prompt if unsaved changes)
fileEditor.createCollaboratorTooltip: Create a new collaborator folder and CV template
fileEditor.authRequiredCollaborators: Authentication required - Sign in with Google to create collaborators
